016
017package org.vafer.jdeb.ant;
018
019import java.io.File;
020import java.util.ArrayList;
021import java.util.Arrays;
022import java.util.Collection;
023
024import org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException;
025import org.apache.tools.ant.Project;
026import org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.MatchingTask;
027import org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Tar;
028import org.apache.tools.ant.types.FileSet;
029import org.vafer.jdeb.Console;
030import org.vafer.jdeb.DataProducer;
031import org.vafer.jdeb.DebMaker;
032import org.vafer.jdeb.PackagingException;
033import org.vafer.jdeb.producers.DataProducerFileSet;
034import org.vafer.jdeb.utils.OutputTimestampResolver;
035
036/**
037 * AntTask for creating debian archives.
038 */
039public class DebAntTask extends MatchingTask {
040
041    /** The Debian package produced */
042    private File deb;
043
044    /** The directory containing the control files to build the package */
045    private File control;
046
047    /** The character character encoding to use when reading control and changes files. */
048    private String encoding;
049
050    /** The file containing the PGP keys */
051    private File keyring;
052
053    /** The key to use in the keyring */
054    private String key;
055
056    /** The passphrase for the key to sign the changes file */
057    private String passphrase;
058
059    /** The file to read the changes from */
060    private File changesIn;
061
062    /** The file where to write the changes to */
063    private File changesOut;
064
065    /** The file where to write the changes of the changes input to */
066    private File changesSave;
067
068    /** Enable the creation of the changes file */
069    private boolean changesEnabled = true;
070
071    /** The compression method used for the data file (none, gzip, bzip2 or xz) */
072    private String compression = "gzip";
073
074    /**
075     * The digest algorithm to use.
076     *
077     * @see org.bouncycastle.bcpg.HashAlgorithmTags
078     */
079    private String digest = "SHA256";
080
081    /** Trigger the verbose mode detailing all operations */
082    private boolean verbose;
083
084    private Collection<Link> links = new ArrayList<>();
085
086    private Collection<DataProducer> dataProducers = new ArrayList<>();
087    private Collection<DataProducer> conffilesProducers = new ArrayList<>();
088
089
090    public void setDestfile( File deb ) {
091        this.deb = deb;
092    }
093
094    public void setControl( File control ) {
095        this.control = control;
096    }
097
098    public void setEncoding( String encoding ) {
099        this.encoding = encoding;
100    }
101
102    public void setChangesIn( File changes ) {
103        this.changesIn = changes;
104    }
105
106    public void setChangesOut( File changes ) {
107        this.changesOut = changes;
108    }
109
110    public void setChangesSave( File changes ) {
111        this.changesSave = changes;
112    }
113
114    public void setKeyring( File keyring ) {
115        this.keyring = keyring;
116    }
117
118    public void setKey( String key ) {
119        this.key = key;
120    }
121
122    public void setPassphrase( String passphrase ) {
123        this.passphrase = passphrase;
124    }
125
126    public void setCompression( String compression ) {
127        this.compression = compression;
128    }
129
130    public void setVerbose( boolean verbose ) {
131        this.verbose = verbose;
132    }
133
134    public void addFileSet( FileSet fileset ) {
135        dataProducers.add(new DataProducerFileSet(fileset));
136    }
137
138    public void addTarFileSet( Tar.TarFileSet fileset ) {
139        dataProducers.add(new DataProducerFileSet(fileset));
140    }
141
142    public void addData( Data data ) {
143        dataProducers.add(data);
144    }
145
146    public void addLink( Link link ) {
147        links.add(link);
148    }
149
150    public void setDigest(String digest) {
151        this.digest = digest;
152    }
153
154    public void execute() {
155        // add the data producers for the links
156        for (Link link : links) {
157            dataProducers.add(link.toDataProducer());
158        }
159
160        // validate the type of the <data> elements
161        for (DataProducer dataProducer : dataProducers) {
162            if (dataProducer instanceof Data) {
163                Data data = (Data) dataProducer;
164                if (data.getType() == null) {
165                    throw new BuildException("The type of the data element wasn't specified (expected 'file', 'directory' or 'archive')");
166                } else if (!Arrays.asList("file", "directory", "archive").contains(data.getType().toLowerCase())) {
167                    throw new BuildException("The type '" + data.getType() + "' of the data element is unknown (expected 'file', 'directory' or 'archive')");
168                }
169                if (data.getConffile() != null && data.getConffile()) {
170                    conffilesProducers.add(dataProducer);
171                }
172            }
173        }
174
175        Console console = new TaskConsole(this, verbose);
176
177        DebMaker debMaker = new DebMaker(console, dataProducers, conffilesProducers);
178        debMaker.setDeb(deb);
179        debMaker.setControl(control);
180        debMaker.setEncoding(encoding);
181        debMaker.setChangesIn(changesIn);
182        debMaker.setChangesOut(changesOut);
183        debMaker.setChangesSave(changesSave);
184        debMaker.setChangesEnabled(changesEnabled);
185        debMaker.setKeyring(keyring);
186        debMaker.setKey(key);
187        debMaker.setPassphrase(passphrase);
188        debMaker.setCompression(compression);
189        debMaker.setDigest(digest);
190        Long outputTimestampMs = new OutputTimestampResolver(console).resolveOutputTimestamp(null);
191        debMaker.setOutputTimestampMs(outputTimestampMs);
192
193        try {
194            debMaker.validate();
195            debMaker.makeDeb();
196
197        } catch (PackagingException e) {
198            log("Failed to create the Debian package " + deb, e, Project.MSG_ERR);
199            throw new BuildException("Failed to create the Debian package " + deb, e);
200        }
201    }
202}
